Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: basically difference between `whats in it for me` and `whats in it for the ecosystem/community`.  This extends far beyond crypto. Long term, a 1% rise in KMD value thanks to projects, initiatives  and capabilities  benefits far more and longer into future  than 1% now for 1 year of VOTE token paybacks.

Content: I understand the strategy of offering your own chains coins to extend adoption from a devs perspective, but `does not compute` for me from a voter perspective.
